headline: Is Increased Focus on Hypersonic Tech Opening New Doors for Rocket Lab?
summary: RKLB gains momentum with its HASTE system, landing key defense contracts as hypersonic demand surges globally.

headline: Lockheed Martin and Electra Expand Collaboration to Accelerate EL9 Ultra-STOL Commercialization
summary: Lockheed Martin Skunk Works® (NYSE: LMT) and Electra.aero, Inc. ("Electra") signed a Memorandum of Understanding to explore opportunities for Electra's EL9 ultra-short takeoff and landing (Ultra-STOL) aircraft.

headline: Lockheed Martin: delivery of THAAD system to the US Army
summary: Lockheed Martin has announced the delivery of an eighth battery of the Terminal High Altitude Area Defense system to the US government. The batch includes three launchers and a fire control unit,...

headline: Lockheed Martin outlines air defence system for Britain, FT says
summary: Lockheed Martin has outlineda plan to help Britain build a new missile defence system, theFinancial Times said on Thursday, citing an official of the U.S.firm and defence sources. ...

headline: RTX Stock Looks to Prosper as Middle Eastern Conflict Escalates
summary: Amid rising tensions between Israel and Iran, the need for cutting-edge defense capabilities is more urgent than ever. RTX Corporation (RTX) plays a crucial role in this space, supporting systems such as Israel’s Iron Dome and other defense initiatives. While not a high-growth stock, RTX offers a resilient investment amid macroeconomic uncertainty, with a forward dividend yield of 1.87% providing an additional layer of return stability for investors.
